agent.name: Sales Pipeline
agent.description: Unified sales pipeline visibility across Salesforce and Dynamics 365. Real-time insights during CRM migration.
agent.author: Copilot Entra Agent Team

metadata.name: SalesPipeline
metadata.description: Get real-time sales pipeline insights, opportunity analysis, and forecasting. Works seamlessly whether your data is in Salesforce, Dynamics 365, or both during migration.

actions.name: pipeline_summary
actions.description: Get unified pipeline summary across all CRM systems

example.output: Pipeline: $847.3M across 1,247 opportunities. Data from Salesforce (35K users) + D365 (10K migrated). +12.3% vs last quarter.

actions.name: at_risk_deals
actions.description: Identify deals at risk with AI recommendations

example.output: 3 at-risk deals totaling $10.1M. Top risk: Global Manufacturing Corp ($4.2M) - stalled 18 days. Recommend: Executive briefing + competitive deck.
Forecast: $234.5M committed, $312.7M best case. 94% confidence of hitting $280M target. Upside: Push Nordic Energy this week.
Top 5: 1) Internal ($12.4M, D365) 2) Global Logistics ($8.7M, SF) 3) Nordic Energy ($8.2M, SF). Focus: Nordic - largest early-stage deal.
847 reps: 312 above quota, 237 below 80%. Top: Sarah Chen (142%). Insight: Top performers use AI assistant 3.2x more.

useCases: Unified pipeline view during CRM migration
At-risk deal identification with AI recommendations
description: Unified sales pipeline visibility across Salesforce and Dynamics 365 with AI insights
trigger_phrases: Show me my pipeline summary for this quarter

conversation_flow.user_message: Show me my pipeline summary for this quarter
conversation_flow.agent_response:
**Q4 Pipeline Summary**

**Data Sources:** Salesforce (35,000 users) + Dynamics 365 (10,000 migrated)

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Total Pipeline | $847.3M |
| Qualified Opportunities | 1,247 |
| vs Last Quarter | +12.3% |
| Win Rate Trend | 67% (up from 61%) |
| Avg Deal Size | $679K |

**Stage Breakdown:**
- Discovery: 423 deals ($156.2M)
- Qualification: 312 deals ($198.7M)
- Proposal: 287 deals ($243.1M)
- Negotiation: 156 deals ($187.4M)
- Closing: 69 deals ($61.9M)

**AI Insight:** Pipeline velocity increased 23% since unified reporting went live. Teams using AI assistant close deals 8 days faster.

ðŸ”§ Agent: SalesPipeline.pipeline_summary

**At-Risk Opportunities: $10.1M Total**

**1. Global Manufacturing Corp - $4.2M** (Salesforce)
- Stage: Negotiation | Stalled: 18 days
- Risk Factors: No executive engagement, competitor identified, budget review pending
- **Recommended Actions:**
  - Schedule executive briefing with CFO
  - Prepare competitive differentiation deck
  - Offer pilot program to reduce perceived risk

**2. TechStart Industries - $2.8M** (Dynamics 365)
- Stage: Proposal | Stalled: 12 days
- Risk Factors: Champion went silent, Q1 budget constraints
- **Recommended Actions:**
  - Multi-thread to procurement and IT leads
  - Propose Q2 start with Q1 pilot
  - Share ROI case study

**3. Energy Solutions Ltd - $3.1M** (Salesforce)
- Stage: Qualification | Stalled: 21 days
- Risk Factors: Competing priorities, key stakeholder on leave
- **Recommended Actions:**
  - Wait for stakeholder return (Jan 15)
  - Send value summary to backup contact

**AI Priority:** Focus on Global Manufacturing Corp - highest value with clear action path.

ðŸ”§ Agent: SalesPipeline.at_risk_deals

demoConversation.content: Show me my pipeline summary for this quarter
